name: Big Mick's Road Repair
description:
IMPORTANT - The rush hour timer is BROKEN! Press H to manually start the Rush hour. Thank you!

In a world gone mad, you are the only man willing to fix the road !

How to play

Fix the road of its potholes before the rush hour.
Save more than half of the cars to beat a level.

Controls

WASD - Drive
Left mouse - Pour concrete
R - Restart game
H - Start the Rush Hour

Credits
